scripts.build: npm run clean -s; npm run mkdirs -s; npm run jshint; npm run min:all -s; npm run copyassets -s;
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir dist; mkdir dist/assets; mkdir dist/assets/fonts; mkdir dist/assets/images; mkdir dist/assets/js; mkdir dist/assets/css; mkdir dist/inc;
scripts.min:all: npm run min:js; npm run min:css; npm run process-html
scripts.min:js: uglifyjs assets/js/jquery-1.10.2.min.js assets/js/jquery-migrate-1.2.1.min.js assets/js/jquery.flexslider.js assets/js/waypoints.js assets/js/jquery.fittext.js assets/js/magnific-popup.js assets/js/jquery.nav.js assets/js/jquery.sticky.js assets/js/jquery.easypiechart.min.js assets/js/app.js --compress --mangle --output dist/assets/js/app.min.js --source-map dist/assets/js/app.min.js.map;
scripts.copyassets: cp -r assets/fonts/ dist/assets/fonts; cp assets/images/* dist/assets/images; cp assets/js/Modernizr.js dist/assets/js; cp favicon.* dist;  cp inc/* dist/inc;
scripts.process-html: npm run htmlpre; npm run min:html
scripts.install:globals: npm install uglify-js -g; npm install -g htmlprocessor; npm install node-sass -g; npm install jshint -g
